Description.Name: The Death's Mask
Description.Details:
Darius knocks on your cabin's door in the middle of the night, his face palid. "It has started Commander. Several crew members have been hospitalized in the last hours, all with symptoms of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDeathsMask],Death's Mask]]. 

[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] have already been placed life support and both [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]]'s vitals are also quickly degrading. Their faces are turning twisted like the other casualties from the holo-vids coming from across the entire Periphery. The MedTechs say that at this point the epidemic might be contained but we can't be sure if everyone has been already infected."

Description.Name: Let the Death's Mask epidemic run its course.
High death toll among the crew
Description.Details: Late the next afternoon, Darius arrives at your quarters with the butcher's bill. "[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] have died from the plague, and all ship departments report additional losses. And I have more bad news Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Inner Sphere has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can be prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to Inner Sphere space."

Description.Name: Call for help from nearby DropShips.
High death toll among the crew
Description.Details: Late in the evening, Sumire notifies you that some of the nearby starships replied to the distress calls but none sent any actual help other than quarantine recommendations. On the next day Darius comes to you with the butcher's bill. "[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] are dead from the Death's Mask, and all ship departments report additional losses, although we managed to implement a few containment measures. And I have more bad news Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Inner Sphere has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can be prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to Inner Sphere space."

Description.Name: High death toll among the crew
Description.Details: Late in the evening, Sumire notifies you that some of the nearby starships replied to the distress calls and even sent medical supplies to help. On the next day Darius comes to you with the butcher's bill. "[[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]], [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] and [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] are dead from the Death's Mask, and all ship departments report additional losses, although we managed to implement a few containment measures. And I have more bad news Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Inner Sphere has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can be prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to Inner Sphere space."

Description.Name: Moderate death toll among the crew
Description.Details: "That's bullshit," you snap at Darius. "We spent a lot of money on that Hospital Bay precisely to deal with this sort of medical emergencies." "Commander…" begins Darius, before stopping himself. He follows you as you stalk over to the Hospital Bay, where you yell at the MedTechs, and generally clarify that letting the infected die is not an option. The stressed MedTechs scurry around trying every risky solution they can think of to save the infected. A few hours after you arrive {TRT_MW.Det} vital signs improve. Just as exhausted as the MedBay staff, you still find strength for another depresing report from Darius. "I have more bad news Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Inner Sphere has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can be prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to Inner Sphere space."

Description.Name: Instruct MedTechs to try your Pox antivirals against the Death's Mask virus.
Moderate losses among the crew
Description.Details: You call for Dr. Murad. "We've gotten those expensive antivirals to use on our people. Make sure the MedTechs spare no efforts for lack of medical treatments. Hours later, she comes back with the final report on casualties. "We still lost people to the Death's Mask even after using all our stock of antivirals. This confirms that the pox plague has mutated into a more deadlier form, making the existing medicine insufficient to treat it until a new antiviral is developed. And I have more bad news Commander. The pox has spread so much that the Inner Sphere has declared a pandemic and have imposed quarantine measures to all incoming Periphery traffic. Until we can be prove that the Argo is plague free, no JumpShip will allow us to travel to Inner Sphere space."
